title: The Cabinet of Dr. Caligari
description: Hypnotist Dr. Caligari uses a somnambulist, Cesare, to commit murders.

title: Way Down East
description: A naive country girl is tricked into a sham marriage by a wealthy womanizer, then must rebuild her life despite the stigma of having an illegitimate child.

title: The Kid
description: The Tramp cares for an abandoned child, but events put that relationship in jeopardy.

title: The Phantom Carriage
description: On New Year's Eve, the driver of a ghostly carriage forces a drunken man to reflect on his selfish, wasted life.

title: Nosferatu
description: Vampire Count Orlok expresses interest in a new residence and real estate agent Hutter's wife.

title: Dr. Mabuse the Gambler
description: Arch-criminal Dr. Mabuse sets out to make a fortune and run Berlin using his hypnotic powers.

title: Nanook of the North
description: A pioneering documentary film depicting the life of an Inuk family in the Canadian Arctic.

title: Häxan
description: Fictionalized documentary showing the evolution of witchcraft, from its pagan roots to its confusion with hysteria in modern Europe.

title: Safety Last!
description: A boy leaves his small country town and heads to the big city to get a job. As soon as he makes it big his sweetheart will join him and marry him. His enthusiasm to get ahead leads to some interesting adventures.

title: Our Hospitality
description: A man returns to his Appalachian homestead to claim his inheritance, only to find himself amidst a family feud.

title: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
description: In 15th-century Paris, the brother of the archdeacon plots with the gypsy king to foment a peasant revolt. Meanwhile, a freakish hunchback falls in love with the gypsy queen.

title: Sherlock Jr.
description: A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.

title: The Thief of Bagdad
description: A thief falls in love with the Caliph of Bagdad's daughter. The Caliph will give her hand to the suitor that brings back the rarest treasure after seven moons.

title: Greed
description: The sudden fortune won from a lottery fans such destructive greed that it ruins the lives of the three people involved.

title: The Last Laugh
description: An aging doorman is forced to retire and suffers a crisis of confidence.

title: He Who Gets Slapped
description: A brilliant scientist, betrayed by his wife and benefactor, becomes a circus clown who gets slapped by other clowns for the amusement of the audience.

title: The Gold Rush
description: A prospector goes to the Klondike Gold Rush in hopes of making his fortune, and is smitten with a girl he sees in a dance hall.

title: Battleship Potemkin
description: In the midst of the Russian Revolution of 1905, the crew of the battleship Potemkin mutiny against the brutal, tyrannical regime of the vessel's officers.

title: The Big Parade
description: A young American soldier witnesses the horrors of the Great War.

title: The Phantom of the Opera
description: A mad, disfigured composer seeks love with a lovely young opera singer.

title: Seven Chances
description: A man learns he will inherit seven million dollars if he is married by 7:00 PM on his 27th birthday.

title: Ben-Hur: A Tale of the Christ
description: A Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.

title: The General
description: When Union spies steal an engineer's beloved locomotive, he pursues it single-handedly and straight through enemy lines.

title: Faust
description: The demon Mephisto wagers with God that he can corrupt a mortal man's soul.

title: The Adventures of Prince Achmed
description: A silhouette animation based on the stories of One Thousand and One Nights.

title: Flesh and the Devil
description: Two childhood friends are separated by their mutual love for the same woman.

title: Metropolis
description: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working-class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.

title: Sunrise: A Song of Two Humans
oscars_won_details: Best Picture, Unique and Artistic Production
Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: A sophisticated urban woman seduces a farmer in the hopes that he will murder his neglected wife and join her in the city.

title: Wings
description: Two young men, one rich, one middle class, who are in love with the same woman, become fighter pilots in World War I.

title: Napoleon
description: A film about the early life of Napoleon Bonaparte, from his school days to his flight from Corsica, and through the French Revolution.

title: The Unknown
description: A criminal on the run hides in a circus and pretends to be armless to avoid the police, but he falls in love with the ringmaster's daughter.

title: The Lodger: A Story of the London Fog
description: A landlady suspects her new lodger is the madman killing women in London.

title: 7th Heaven
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: A street cleaner saves a young woman's life, and they slowly fall in love until war intervenes.

title: The Jazz Singer
oscars_won_details: Special Award (For producing the pioneer outstanding talking picture)
description: The son of a Jewish Cantor must defy the traditions of his religious father in order to pursue his dream of becoming a jazz singer.

title: It
description: A salesgirl with plenty of "it" (sex appeal) pursues a handsome playboy while her boss tries to win her affections.

title: Underworld
description: A gangster saves a down-and-out lawyer and helps him clean up, but trouble brews when the lawyer falls for the gangster's girlfriend.

title: The Passion of Joan of Arc
description: In 1431, Jeanne d'Arc is placed on trial on charges of heresy. The ecclesiastical jurists attempt to force Jeanne to recant her holy visions.

title: Steamboat Bill, Jr.
description: The effete son of a cantankerous riverboat captain comes to join his father's crew.

title: The Circus
oscars_won_details: Special Award (To Charles Chaplin, for acting, writing, directing and producing The Circus)
description: The Tramp finds work and the girl of his dreams at a circus.

title: The Crowd
description: The life of a man and woman together in a large faceless city.

title: The Cameraman
description: A hopeless photographer purchases a movie camera, hoping to become a newsreel cameraman to woo a girl who works at the newsreel office.

title: The Wind
description: A frail young woman from the east moves in with her cousin in the west, where she causes tension within the family and is driven mad by the wind.

title: The Last Command
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
description: A former Imperial Russian general and cousin to the Czar ends up in Hollywood as an extra in a movie directed by a former revolutionary.

title: Street Angel
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: A spirited young woman who turns to prostitution to pay for her dying mother's medicine finds sanctuary in a traveling circus.

title: Sadie Thompson
description: A self-righteous missionary tries to "save" a prostitute on a South Seas island.

title: In Old Arizona
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
description: A charming, happy-go-lucky bandit in the old west is pursued by a relentless sheriff.

title: Man with a Movie Camera
description: An experimental documentary film with no actors or story, presenting urban life in the Soviet cities of Kiev, Kharkov, Moscow and Odessa.

title: Pandora's Box
description: The rise and inevitable fall of an amoral but naive young woman whose insouciant eroticism inspires lust and violence in those around her.

title: Blackmail
description: After killing a man in self-defense, a young woman is blackmailed by a witness.

title: The Broadway Melody
description: A pair of sisters from the vaudeville circuit try to make it big time on Broadway, but matters of the heart complicate the attempt.

title: Un Chien Andalou
description: A surrealist film with no plot, featuring a series of disjointed and shocking images.

title: Diary of a Lost Girl
description: The daughter of a middle-class pharmacist is seduced by her father's assistant, gets pregnant and is rejected by her family.

title: The Divine Lady
description: Lady Hamilton and Admiral Nelson start a romance despite being married to other people.

title: Coquette
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: A flirtatious southern belle finds true love with a man her father disapproves of.

title: Hallelujah
description: Zeke, a cotton picker, accidentally kills a man in a rigged craps game, and decides to become a preacher, but his past comes back to haunt him.

title: The Love Parade
description: Count Alfred Renard, the military attaché to the embassy of Sylvania in Paris, is ordered back to Sylvania to explain his scandalous affairs to the Queen.
